document_data.name: Zaroshni
document_data.mainbody: '''Shestandeliath Zaroshni''' was a [[dragonborn]] member of [[Clan Shestandeliath]] in [[1486 DR]].
document_data.Relationships: Zaroshni was the sister of [[Shestandeliath Parvida|Parvida]] She was in love with [[Dumuzi]], and tried hard to be chosen as his wife.
document_data.History:
Zaroshni was one of the few known members of the [[Liberators of the Steel Sky]].

On [[Nightal 15]] of 1486 DR, Parvida was killed, alongside her fellow companions of the Liberators,

Unlike the rest of the Liberators, the maurezhi ate her in order to impersonate her to infiltrate [[Djerad Thymar]].
